00027 #include <QMutex>
00028 #include <QPixmap>
00029 #include <QMultiHash>
00030 #include <QMultiMap>
00031 #include <QTimer>
00032 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00033 
00034 class KviAnimatedPixmapInterface {
00035 public:
00036          virtual void nextFrame(bool) = 0;
00037          virtual ~KviAnimatedPixmapInterface() {};
00038 };
00039 
00040 class KVILIB_API KviAnimatedPixmapCache : public QObject {
00041         Q_OBJECT
00042 public:
00043         /*
00044          * This subclass represents simple structure
00045          * to store animated frame data: cached pixmap, and next frame delay.
00046          *
00047          * It provides copyconstructor, wich makes possible to simple
00048          * assign two containers with this classes.
00049          *
00050          * All data will be dublicated in such case.
00051          */
00052         class FrameInfo {
00053         public:
00054                 QPixmap *pixmap; //frame pixmap
00055                 uint delay; //next frame delay
00056 
00057                 FrameInfo(QPixmap *_pixmap, uint _delay) {
00058                         pixmap = _pixmap;
00059                         delay = _delay;
00060                 }
00061 
00062                 FrameInfo(const FrameInfo& source) {
00063                         pixmap = source.pixmap;
00064                         delay = source.delay;
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 void detach() {
00068                         pixmap = new QPixmap(*pixmap);
00069                 }
00070         };
00071 
00072         /*
00073          * This helper class represents data structure
00074          * for storing frames.
00075          *
00076          * It adds references counter and
00077          * mutex, to provide thread-safety.
00078          */
00079         class Data: public QList<FrameInfo> {
00080         public:
00081                 uint     refs;    //references count
00082                 QSize    size;    //size of the pixmaps
00083                 QString  file;    //just to speedup the cache
00084                 bool     resized;
00085 
00086                 Data(QString szFile) :
00087                         QList<FrameInfo> (), refs(0), file(szFile), resized(false) {
00088                 }
00089 
00090                 Data(Data& other) :
00091                         QList<FrameInfo> (other), refs(0), file(other.file), resized(false) {
00092                                 for(int i=0;i<count();i++)
00093                                 {
00094                                         this->operator [](i).detach();
00095                                 }
00096                 }
00097         };
00098 protected:
00099 
00100         mutable QMutex                               m_cacheMutex;
00101         mutable QMutex                               m_timerMutex;
00102 
00103         QMultiHash<QString,Data*>                    m_hCache;
00104         QMultiMap<long long,KviAnimatedPixmapInterface*> m_timerData;
00105         QTimer                                       m_animationTimer;
00106 
00107         /*
00108          * This class is a singletone.
00109          * It doesn't allow to be created directly;
00110          */
00111         KviAnimatedPixmapCache();
00112 
00113         Data* internalLoad  (QString szFile);
00114         Data* internalResize(Data* data,QSize size);
00115 
00116         void  internalFree(Data* data);
00117         inline void  internalScheduleFrameChange(uint delay,KviAnimatedPixmapInterface* receiver);
00118         void  internalNotifyDelete(KviAnimatedPixmapInterface* receiver);
00119 protected slots:
00120         virtual void timeoutEvent();
00121 public:
00122         virtual ~KviAnimatedPixmapCache();
00123 
00124         static void  scheduleFrameChange(uint delay,KviAnimatedPixmapInterface* receiver);
00125         static Data* load(QString szFileName);
00126         static Data* resize(Data* data,QSize size);
00127         static void  free(Data* data);
00128         static QPixmap* dummyPixmap();
00129         static void notifyDelete(KviAnimatedPixmapInterface* receiver);
00130 };
00131 
00132 #endif /* KVI_ANIMATEDPIXMAPCACHE_H_ */
